Articles.Content:
hi guys, here's my current mission : get the most asteroids i can on a space station.

i have 4 at the moment.

2 A asteroids, one B asteroid, and a D one which needed 4 rockets alone to bring to the station.

Big one is nearly 200 tons (with the small rocket)

To dock the last and big one it was easier to turn the whole station than the asteroid.

NO cheats used, only mod is flight engineer which isn't 0.235 ready

Edited May 22, 2014 by thegab

It now has 3 As, 2 Bs, one C and one D

I have to add more parts to the station because next up...i'll be adding an E asteroid.
Your fps must be slowed to a crawl I suspect, where is your COM located?
Very pretty. It's like one of those bag worms that incorporates gravel, sticks, and other debris into its cocoon

Your fps must be slowed to a crawl I suspect, where is your COM located?

FPS count is not great but still playable, the main problem is when i get within a few kilometers, i know the precise moment when it gets loaded into ram.

only the first asteroid was captured with a manned vehicle, since then i use remote ships (first is the one on the left in the first picture)
